accordion.default: 是否使用手风琴展开模式

allow-checking-not-loaded.default: 是否允许级联勾选还没有完全加载的节点。如果你要用这个属性，请记住 checked-keys 可能是不完整的，并且请注意勾选行为和后端计算逻辑的一致性，尤其是有禁用节点的情况下

allow-drop.description: `(info: { dropPosition: DropPosition, node: TreeOption, phase: 'drag' | 'drop' }) => boolean`
allow-drop.type: (info: { dropPosition: DropPosition, node: TreeOption, phase: 'drag' | 'drop' }) => boolean

cancelable.default: 选中之后是否允许取消

check-strategy.default: 设置勾选策略来指定勾选回调返回的值，all 表示回调函数值为全部选中节点；parent 表示回调函数值为父节点（当父节点下所有子节点都选中时）；child 表示回调函数值为子节点

children-field.default: 替代 TreeOption 中的 children 字段名

checked-keys.default: 如果设定则 checked 状态受控

check-on-click.default: 是否允许点击节点进行勾选，仅在 checkable 为 true 时生效

data.default: 树的节点数据。重新设置 data 会将一些非受控状态清空，如果你需要在使用中改动 data，最好以受控的方式控制树

expand-on-dragenter.default: 是否在拖入后展开节点

expand-on-click.default: 是否在点击节点后展开或收缩节点

filter.default: 基于 pattern 指定过滤节点的函数

get-children.default: 获取当前选项的子选项

key-field.default: 替代 TreeOption 中的 key 字段名

label-field.default: 替代 TreeOption 中的 label 字段名

disabled-field.default: 替代 TreeOption 中的 disabled 字段名

render-label.description: `(info: { option: TreeOption, checked: boolean, selected: boolean }) => VNodeChild`
render-label.type: (info: { option: TreeOption, checked: boolean, selected: boolean }) => VNodeChild

render-prefix.description: `(info: { option: TreeOption, checked: boolean, selected: boolean }) => VNodeChild`
render-prefix.type: (info: { option: TreeOption, checked: boolean, selected: boolean }) => VNodeChild

render-suffix.description: `(info: { option: TreeOption, checked: boolean, selected: boolean }) => VNodeChild`
render-suffix.type: (info: { option: TreeOption, checked: boolean, selected: boolean }) => VNodeChild

render-switcher-icon.description: `(props: { option: TreeOption, expanded: boolean, selected: boolean }) => VNodeChild`
render-switcher-icon.default: 节点展开开关的渲染函数
render-switcher-icon.type: (props: { option: TreeOption, expanded: boolean, selected: boolean }) => VNodeChild

selected-keys.default: 如果设定则 selected 状态受控

show-irrelevant-nodes.default: 是否在搜索状态显示和搜索无关的节点

virtual-scroll.default: 是否启用虚拟滚动，启用前你需要设定好树的高度样式

watch-props.default: 需要检测变更的默认属性，检测后组件状态会更新。注意：watch-props 本身不是响应式的

type2.name: key
type2.type: 节点的 `key`，需要唯一，可使用 `key-field` 修改字段名

type2.name: label
type2.type: 节点的内容，可使用 `label-field` 修改字段名

type2.name: isLeaf?
type2.type: 节点是否是叶节点，在异步展开状态下是必须的

events.name: drop
events.description: `(data: { node: TreeOption, dragNode: TreeOption, dropPosition: 'before' | 'inside' | 'after', event: DragEvent }) => void`
events.params: `(data: { node: TreeOption, dragNode: TreeOption, dropPosition: 'before' | 'inside' | 'after', event: DragEvent }) => void`

events.name: update:checked-keys
events.description: `(keys: Array<string | number>, option: Array<TreeOption | null>, meta: { node: TreeOption | null, action: 'check' | 'uncheck' }) => void`
events.params: `(keys: Array<string | number>, option: Array<TreeOption | null>, meta: { node: TreeOption | null, action: 'check' | 'uncheck' }) => void`

events.name: update:indeterminate-keys
events.description: `(keys: Array<string | number>, option: Array<TreeOption | null>) => void`
events.params: `(keys: Array<string | number>, option: Array<TreeOption | null>) => void`

events.name: update:expanded-keys
events.description: `(keys: Array<string | number>, option: Array<TreeOption | null>, meta: { node: TreeOption | null, action: 'expand' | 'collapse' | 'filter' }) => void`
events.params: `(keys: Array<string | number>, option: Array<TreeOption | null>, meta: { node: TreeOption | null, action: 'expand' | 'collapse' | 'filter' }) => void`

events.name: update:selected-keys
events.description: `(keys: Array<string | number>, option: Array<TreeOption | null>, meta: { node: TreeOption, action: 'select' | 'unselect' }) => void`
events.params: `(keys: Array<string | number>, option: Array<TreeOption | null>, meta: { node: TreeOption, action: 'select' | 'unselect' }) => void`
